name: DadRevelations
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: From Day 1 as a parent, I suddenly realized this indescribable feeling of being a dad: an unconditional love I never experienced before. A "Dad Revelation", if you will. That was over a decade ago and since then we've had another child, fostered more than 8 other kids and I have a few things to say about it all. Hope you're encouraged and maybe even learn a little as we stumble through parenthood together.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
